DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: Ford , Chrysler Win U.S. Fuel_Cell Contracts : The auto_makers have been the awarded contracts as part of a federal effort to develop a new generation of vehicles to meet strict environmental standards and triple the fuel economy of gasoline-powered internal_combustion engines , the nonprofit Fuel_Cells 2000 group said . The Ford contract is for $ 13.8 million ; Chrysler ' s Pentastar Electronics Inc. contract is for $ 15 million . Fuel_cells act like continuously renewed batteries , combining hydrogen and oxygen to produce electricity and water , without combustion and its attendant pollution .
